overview: Hot, hairy, full grown men, in the prime of their lives. Living, working and sweating in the rugged mountain terrain, these men get through the rigors of the day with plenty of healthy Colt man-on-man contact.  After the huge success of Colt Studio's release Bear, director Kristofer Weston brings together a fresh crop of hot, furry men for a sex-fuelled romp on Fur Mountain.
title: Fur Mountain
